name: BSL Shaders
settings: Enable LOD Shading in DH settings. Set shadow quality to medium for best results.
knownIssues: Minor chunk border flickering at LOD transitions under certain lighting conditions.

name: Complementary Reimagined
settings: Works out of the box with DH. Enable DH support in shader settings for optimal blending.
knownIssues: LOD chunks may appear slightly brighter than loaded chunks during sunset/sunrise.

name: Complementary Unbound
settings: Native DH integration. Enable 'Distant Horizons Support' in shader options.
knownIssues: Volumetric fog may not render correctly on LOD chunks in some biomes.

name: Rethinking Voxels
settings: Enable DH compatibility mode in shader settings.
knownIssues: Path-traced lighting does not extend to LOD chunks. Global illumination limited to render distance.

name: Bliss Shaders
settings: Toggle DH support in shader config. Recommended with Sodium for best performance.
knownIssues: Water reflections may show seams at LOD boundaries.

name: Photon Shader
settings: DH integration built-in. No extra configuration needed.
knownIssues: TAA ghosting can be more noticeable at LOD chunk edges.

name: Solas Shader
settings: Enable DH support in shader options menu.
knownIssues: None reported. Lightweight and works well with DH.

name: Shrimple
settings: DH support available in advanced settings. Enable for LOD shading.
knownIssues: Some visual artifacts with colored lighting on LOD chunks.

name: SEUS Renewed
settings: Requires manual config: disable volumetric lighting for LOD chunks.
knownIssues: Shadow rendering breaks on LOD chunks. Lighting mismatch between loaded and LOD terrain.

name: SEUS PTGI HRR
settings: Limited DH support. Disable ray tracing effects beyond render distance.
knownIssues: Path tracing does not work on LOD chunks. Significant visual inconsistency at boundaries.

name: Kappa Shader
settings: Partial support. Some features disabled on LOD chunks.
knownIssues: Cloud shadows misalign with LOD terrain. PBR textures don't apply to LOD blocks.

name: Continuum 2.1
settings: Disable temporal effects for LOD compatibility.
knownIssues: Severe color mismatch between loaded and LOD chunks. POM/PBR not supported on LODs.

name: Chocapic13 V9
settings: Basic DH compatibility. Disable ambient occlusion on LOD chunks for fewer artifacts.
knownIssues: AO artifacts at LOD boundaries. Fog blending imperfect.

name: Nostalgia Shader
settings: Full DH support built-in. No additional configuration required.
knownIssues: None reported.

name: AstraLex Shaders
settings: DH support in shader options. Enable for extended terrain rendering.
knownIssues: Minimal issues. Slight shadow pop-in at LOD transitions.

name: Soft Voxels Lite
settings: Works with DH out of the box.
knownIssues: Voxel lighting limited to loaded chunks only.

name: Iterationáµ€
settings: Native DH support. Configure LOD shading quality in shader settings.
knownIssues: Performance-heavy. Recommended 8GB+ VRAM for DH + shader combo.

name: Super Duper Vanilla
settings: No special config needed. Designed for vanilla aesthetics with DH support.
knownIssues: None reported. Excellent lightweight option.

name: Sildur's Vibrant Shaders
settings: No DH support. LOD chunks render without shader effects.
knownIssues: Complete rendering mismatch between loaded and LOD terrain. No active DH integration planned.

name: FLAVOR
settings: Not compatible with DH.
knownIssues: Crashes or severe visual glitches when used with DH enabled.
